title: 2D Part. Motion: graph, dx/dt, dy/dt, init. cond.

content.description:
A GRAPHING CALCULATOR IS REQUIRED FOR THIS QUESTION.

A particle moving in the xy-plane has position <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>,</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> Justify your answer.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
